articles.title: Bridgerton's Regé-Jean Page says show representation is “relief" - Digital Spy
articles.description: Simon Basset actor is proud period drama is "representing more people".
articles.content:
Bridgerton star Regé-Jean Page has praised the diversity of the upcoming Netflix period drama, saying that it feels like "a relief" to be able to represent so many different people.
